stories.original_headline: This wild fruit is getting a CRISPR makeover
stories.original_summary: Scientists have used CRISPR to give the goldenberry a modern makeover, shrinking the plant by about a third and making it easier to farm. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Enchant Wild Sunberries for Easier Harvests!
stories.fantasy_story: A circle of skilled alchemists has cast subtle enchantments upon the unruly wild sunberry, transforming its growth. They have made the fruit's vines more manageable, making it simpler for farmers to gather the nutritious berries. This ancient plant magic promises bountiful harvests for the land.

stories.original_headline: A never-before-seen creature has been found in the Great Salt Lake
stories.original_summary: Scientists have identified a brand-new species of worm living in the Great Salt Lake, marking only the third known animal group able to survive its extreme salinity. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover New Life in the Azure Mire!
stories.fantasy_story: Scholars of the Arcane have uncovered a wondrous, never-before-seen creature dwelling deep within the Crystalline Shallows. This tiny serpent-kin thrives in the lake's harsh, salty waters, one of the few beings able to survive there. Named with guidance from the desert's wise folk, it exists nowhere else.

stories.fantasy_headline: Lord Elara Vows to Unveil Grand Scrying Mirror's Inner Workings!
stories.fantasy_story: Lord Elara, master of the Whisperwind Guild, has pledged to reveal the secrets behind the Grand Scrying Mirror's magic. This powerful artifact sorts all whispered tidings for the realm's citizens. While older enchantments were once shared, these new workings promise to be truly illuminating.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Artisans' Fair Showcases Marvelous New Household Enchantments!
stories.fantasy_story: The annual Grand Artisans' Fair recently displayed many ingenious domestic marvels. Among the most impressive were Clan Aqara's Warded Door Latch and Clan Roborock's Saros Dust-Gazer Golem. It was a magnificent season for those seeking magical aids for their abodes.
